sections.title: Green Faith Acolyte (Class Overview)
sections.description: Overview of the Green Faith Acolyte class including role, alignment, hit die, and starting wealth.

sections.title: Weapon and Armor Proficiency (Green Faith Acolyte)
sections.description: Green Faith acolytes gain no additional weapon or armor proficiencies beyond their base class.

sections.title: Companion Bond ([Ex](https://www.d20pfsrd.com/magic#TOC-Extraordinary-Abilities-Ex-)) (Green Faith Acolyte)
sections.description: Increases effective druid level for animal companion abilities, or grants an animal companion if none exists at half class level.

sections.title: Wild Empathy ([Ex](https://www.d20pfsrd.com/magic#TOC-Extraordinary-Abilities-Ex-)) (Green Faith Acolyte)
sections.description: Functions identically to the druid wild empathy ability and stacks with other classes that grant wild empathy.

sections.title: Wild Link (Su) (Green Faith Acolyte)
sections.description: Increases effective druid level for wild shape ability, or grants wild shape at 4th level druid equivalent when reaching +4 bonus.

sections.title: Hibernate (Su) (Green Faith Acolyte)
sections.description: Allows entering suspended animation similar to sepia snake sigil, providing heal and restoration effects after a week of hibernation.

sections.title: Power over Nature (Su) (Green Faith Acolyte)
sections.description: Divine spells deal or heal additional hit point damage equal to spell level against animal, fey, or plant creatures.

sections.title: Animal Covenant (Su) (Green Faith Acolyte)
sections.description: Allows excluding animals from area effect divine spells based on Wisdom or Charisma modifier for a limited duration.

sections.title: Venom Immunity ([Ex](https://www.d20pfsrd.com/magic#TOC-Extraordinary-Abilities-Ex-)) (Green Faith Acolyte)
sections.description: Grants complete immunity to all poisons at 6th level.

sections.title: Blighter of Abominations (Su) (Green Faith Acolyte)
sections.description: Automatically applies Sickening Spell metamagic to aberrations and Empower Spell metamagic to undead without increasing casting time or spell level.

sections.title: Archdruid (Green Faith Acolyte)
sections.description: Must gain the Archdruid title through competition or vacancy to progress to 9th level, can lose title through challenges.

sections.title: Great Druid (Green Faith Acolyte)
sections.description: Must gain the Great Druid title similar to Archdruid to progress to 10th level, gives up title when becoming Grand Druid.

sections.title: Grand Druid (Su) (Green Faith Acolyte)
sections.description: Provides 10 additional spell levels per day that can be prepared or cast, lost if Grand Druid title is lost.

sections.title: Longevity ([Ex](https://www.d20pfsrd.com/magic#TOC-Extraordinary-Abilities-Ex-)) (Green Faith Acolyte)
sections.description: Increases maximum age by 20% at 10th level.

sections.title: Timeless Body ([Ex](https://www.d20pfsrd.com/magic#TOC-Extraordinary-Abilities-Ex-)) (Green Faith Acolyte)
sections.description: Eliminates aging penalties, functioning exactly like the druid ability of the same name.
